description:
Musician Hado is found hanging by the neck above the stage of a concert hall. Inspector Megure believes one of Enjo, Fuse, or Kajiya committed the murder. While looking at Hado`s license and the evidence lined up at Ran`s feet, he comes to a realization. Later, Conan sees Kajiya`s footage of Hado`s face as he entered the concert hall and notices something. After confirming which objects disappeared from the crime scene, he and Amuro and Okiya search the stage and determine the truth behind the case and the trick the killer used to lift the victim`s body...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 裏切りのステージ (後編)
